posts.title: sqli-labs学习
posts.text: less 1 single 单个的quote 引号 输入 /?id=10' 后，便会报错 You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near ''10'' LIMIT 0,1' at line 1 说明该页面存在注入点，反之，则不存在
